meanings.sent1: The benedick was overjoyed on his wedding day.
meanings.sent2: The guests congratulated the benedick on his marriage.
meanings.sent3: The benedick's friends teased him about his new title.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of his wife, the benedick was now a king.
meanings.sent5: The benedick's wedding ring shone brightly in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A man who has recently been married.
meanings.sent1: The happy benedick danced with his bride all night.
meanings.sent2: Everyone toasted to the health of the benedick and his wife.
meanings.sent3: The benedick proudly showed off his wedding photos to his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: To his family, the benedick was now a symbol of love and commitment.
meanings.sent5: The benedick's smile never faded after saying 'I do'.
